duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer full-cycle recruiting for corporate opportunities
Review all resumes, conduct phone screens, and make recommendations on prospective candidates
Source active and passive candidates using social media networking
Establish recruiting requirements and recommend advertising strategies and recruiting sources
Schedule candidates for virtual and on-site interviews
Consult with Subject Matter Experts (SME’s) and employees to develop job descriptions and advertisements
Use negotiation skills and judgment when extending verbal offers
Act as a liaison between candidates, managers, employment agencies, and educational institutions
Monitor and track all open requisitions and provide weekly status reports on activity
Prepare job summaries and conduct job evaluations
Recommend, coordinate, and attend college recruiting events, career days, and community events
Demonstrate excellent oral and written communication skills and communicate effectively with various contacts
Exercise independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance
Participate in company meetings, webinars, and conference calls
Perform other duties and/or special projects as assigned

education_certification.credential: Knowledge of Labor and Employment Laws
Intermediate knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite
